name: Totem Drawen
description:
Enter Fullscreen by pressing 1
Exit Fullscreen by pressing 2

This game was made for the XanderWood SpringJam.
I implemted the theme by stopping something from changing.
(I asked XanderWood and this still fits in the Theme)

The game concept is that you need to keep the totem happy by collecting coins,
and then delivering those collected coins to the totem. If you can keep the bar
ontop atleast 30% when the timer hits 0 you have won.

NOTE: Their is a little secret who can find it?
Its also my first GameJam and fully finished game.
Music made by XanderWood

Bugs Fixed:
Cant restart level - Fixed
Animations - Fixed
Collision hugging - Fixed
Fulscreen - Fixed
